orego.experiment

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.experiment.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Allows two independent GTP programs to play a game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int QUITTING
      Mode where this game is quitting.
      static int REQUESTING_MOVE
      Mode where this game is requesting a move from one of the players.
      static int SENDING_MOVE
      Mode where this game is sending a move, played by one player, to both players.
      PrintWriter[] toPrograms
      Prints to the two program processes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(String filename, String black, String white) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColorToPlay()
      Returns the current color to play.
      int play()
      Plays the game.

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getColorToPlay

        public int getColorToPlay()
        Returns the current color to play.

      • play

        public int play()
        Plays the game.
        Returns:
        the color of the winning player (BLACK or WHITE), as defined in orego.core.Colors.
